content:
Great choices! Drunk Elephant and Sunday Riley are both amazing brands with a focus on natural, effective ingredients and innovative formulations.

Hydrating and brightening are great goals for your skin! Drunk Elephant's products are known for their ability to provide intense hydration and help with skin elasticity, while Sunday Riley's products are famous for their brightening and anti-aging benefits.

Which specific products did Rachel recommend from each brand? Was it the Drunk Elephant Protini Polypeptide Cream, the Sunday Riley Power Couple, or maybe the Good Genes Lactic Acid Treatment?

Also, have you used any products from these brands before, or are you new to them?
